verses.kjv: And it came to pass a long time after that the LORD had given rest unto Israel from all their enemies round about, that Joshua waxed old and stricken in age.
verses.web: After many days, when LORD had given rest to Israel from their enemies all around, and Joshua was old and well advanced in years,
verses.ct: Many years later, after the LORD had given Israel peace from all their surrounding enemies, Joshua had grown very old.

verses.kjv: And Joshua called for all Israel, and for their elders, and for their heads, and for their judges, and for their officers, and said unto them, I am old and stricken in age:
verses.web: Joshua called for all Israel, for their elders and for their heads, and for their judges and for their officers, and said to them, “I am old and well advanced in years.
verses.ct: He called together all of Israel — their elders, leaders, judges, and officials — and said to them, "I am very old now.

verses.kjv: And ye have seen all that the LORD your God hath done unto all these nations because of you; for the LORD your God is he that hath fought for you.
verses.web: You have seen all that LORD your God has done to all these nations because of you; for it is LORD your God who has fought for you.
verses.ct: You've seen everything the LORD your God has done to all these nations on your behalf. The LORD your God himself fought for you.

verses.kjv: Behold, I have divided unto you by lot these nations that remain, to be an inheritance for your tribes, from Jordan, with all the nations that I have cut off, even unto the great sea westward.
verses.web: Behold, I have allotted to you these nations that remain, to be an inheritance for your tribes, from the Jordan, with all the nations that I have cut off, even to the great sea toward the going down of the sun.
verses.ct: I've assigned the remaining nations as an inheritance for your tribes — everything from the Jordan River to the Mediterranean Sea in the west, including all the nations I've already defeated.

verses.kjv: And the LORD your God, he shall expel them from before you, and drive them from out of your sight; and ye shall possess their land, as the LORD your God hath promised unto you.
verses.web: LORD your God will thrust them out from before you, and drive them from out of your sight. You shall possess their land, as LORD your God spoke to you.
verses.ct: The LORD your God will force them out ahead of you and drive them from your land. You will take possession of their territory, just as the LORD your God promised you.

verses.kjv: Be ye therefore very courageous to keep and to do all that is written in the book of the law of Moses, that ye turn not aside therefrom to the right hand or to the left;
verses.web: “Therefore be very courageous to keep and to do all that is written in the book of the law of Moses, that you not turn away from it to the right hand or to the left;
verses.ct: So be very courageous. Obey everything written in the book of the law of Moses. Don't stray from it in any direction.

verses.kjv: That ye come not among these nations, these that remain among you; neither make mention of the name of their gods, nor cause to swear by them, neither serve them, nor bow yourselves unto them:
verses.web: that you not come among these nations, these that remain among you; neither make mention of the name of their gods, nor cause to swear by them, neither serve them, nor bow down yourselves to them;
verses.ct: Don't associate with the nations still living among you. Don't even speak the names of their gods, and never swear by them, worship them, or bow down to them.

verses.kjv: But cleave unto the LORD your God, as ye have done unto this day.
verses.web: but hold fast to LORD your God, as you have done to this day.
verses.ct: Instead, hold tight to the LORD your God, just as you've done up to now.

verses.kjv: For the LORD hath driven out from before you great nations and strong: but as for you, no man hath been able to stand before you unto this day.
verses.web: “For LORD has driven great and strong nations out from before you. But as for you, no man has stood before you to this day.
verses.ct: The LORD has driven out great and powerful nations ahead of you. To this day, not a single one of them has been able to stand against you.

verses.kjv: One man of you shall chase a thousand: for the LORD your God, he it is that fighteth for you, as he hath promised you.
verses.web: One man of you shall chase a thousand; for it is LORD your God who fights for you, as he spoke to you.
verses.ct: One of you can put a thousand to flight, because the LORD your God fights for you, just as he promised.

verses.kjv: Take good heed therefore unto yourselves, that ye love the LORD your God.
verses.web: Take good heed therefore to yourselves, that you love LORD your God.
verses.ct: So guard your hearts carefully, and love the LORD your God.

verses.kjv: Else if ye do in any wise go back, and cleave unto the remnant of these nations, even these that remain among you, and shall make marriages with them, and go in unto them, and they to you:
verses.web: “But if you do at all go back, and hold fast to the remnant of these nations, even these who remain among you, and make marriages with them, and go in to them, and they to you;
verses.ct: But if you turn away and cling to the nations still living among you — if you intermarry with them and mix your lives together —

verses.kjv: Know for a certainty that the LORD your God will no more drive out any of these nations from before you; but they shall be snares and traps unto you, and scourges in your sides, and thorns in your eyes, until ye perish from off this good land which the LORD your God hath given you.
verses.web: know for a certainty that LORD your God will no longer drive these nations from out of your sight; but they shall be a snare and a trap to you, a scourge in your sides, and thorns in your eyes, until you perish from off this good land which LORD your God has given you.
verses.ct: then know for certain that the LORD your God will no longer drive these nations out ahead of you. Instead, they will become snares and traps for you, whips on your backs and thorns in your eyes, until you disappear from this good land the LORD your God has given you.

verses.kjv: And, behold, this day I am going the way of all the earth: and ye know in all your hearts and in all your souls, that not one thing hath failed of all the good things which the LORD your God spake concerning you; all are come to pass unto you, and not one thing hath failed thereof.
verses.web: “Behold, today I am going the way of all the earth. You know in all your hearts and in all your souls that not one thing has failed of all the good things which LORD your God spoke concerning you. All have happened to you. Not one thing has failed of it.
verses.ct: Today I'm about to die, as every person must. Deep in your hearts and souls, you know that every single good thing the LORD your God promised you has come true. Not one promise has failed.

verses.kjv: Therefore it shall come to pass, that as all good things are come upon you, which the LORD your God promised you; so shall the LORD bring upon you all evil things, until he have destroyed you from off this good land which the LORD your God hath given you.
verses.web: It shall happen that as all the good things have come on you of which LORD your God spoke to you, so LORD will bring on you all the evil things, until he has destroyed you from off this good land which LORD your God has given you,
verses.ct: But just as every good thing he promised has happened, the LORD will also bring every disaster he warned about, until he has wiped you out from this good land the LORD your God gave you —

verses.kjv: When ye have transgressed the covenant of the LORD your God, which he commanded you, and have gone and served other gods, and bowed yourselves to them; then shall the anger of the LORD be kindled against you, and ye shall perish quickly from off the good land which he hath given unto you.
verses.web: when you disobey the covenant of LORD your God, which he commanded you, and go and serve other gods, and bow down yourselves to them. Then LORD’s anger will be kindled against you, and you will perish quickly from off the good land which he has given to you.”
verses.ct: if you break the covenant of the LORD your God that he commanded you to keep, and go off to serve other gods and bow down to them. Then the LORD's anger will burn against you, and you will quickly be destroyed from this good land he gave you."
